name: Invocation
short_description:
Invocation is a server-client platform for playing collectable card games online. It is designed to replicate the face to face experience playing card games with the addition of many online features.

As a whole, Invocation will be game agnostic. Specific games will have more advanced support. A plugin architecture will allow new card games to be added to Invocation as users see fit.

Invocation will feature AI bot players in addition to the humans in multi-player.

Invocation is written in Python.
summary: A Platform for Playing Collectable Card Games Online
